description.narrative: By 2014, the most deprived schools in targeted districts meet minimum standards for Child Friendly schools., which contributes to Learning Outcomes, Sanitation. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2015, the most vulnerable girls and boys have sustainable and equitable access to and use quality, targeted basic social services, particularly to accelerate progress toward MDGs 1, 2, 3, 4

sector.narrative: Provision of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) teacher training
Sanitation and hygiene - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) including menstrual hygiene management
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
Water supply and sanitation - large systems

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2014, the most deprived schools in targeted districts meet minimum standards for Child Friendly schools.
